step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Great job spreading your elbows wide! Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding the stretch nicely. Ensure your elbows remain wide and close to your head.
You're returning to the start position. Try to maintain straighter wrists as you reverse the motion.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and your elbows close to your head as you move. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
